description:
Have a new thermometer, but don't have a device to record your measurements?

This app allows you to track your body temperature on a daily basis. It's very simple, just record the measurements ​​and check the statistics over time.

Note: The app need to have an external device (such as thermometer) to record temperature.

Welcome to OB Wheel & Pregnancy, the most comprehensive app for all expecting mothers and medical professionals! Seamlessly blending practicality with accuracy, our app provides a user-friendly interface with intuitive tools to calculate due dates, track trimesters, and determine measurements.

Calculate Due Date: Say goodbye to manual calculations! Use our OB wheel tool to easily determine your due date with precision. Enter the date of your last menstrual period or the date of conception, and our app will provide the projected due date instantly.

Track Trimesters: Stay informed about each critical phase of your pregnancy. Our app helps you track the progression of your trimesters, providing you with essential information and advice at each step.

Determine Measurements: From the size of your baby to the necessary nutritional intake, this feature helps you monitor everything. Get insights on your baby's growth and your health status with our sophisticated measurement tools.

Due Date Countdown: Experience the joy of seeing your baby’s arrival getting closer day by day. Our due date countdown feature provides a visual representation of the remaining days, building excitement and helping you prepare in time.

Download OB Wheel & Pregnancy today and transform the way you experience pregnancy. This is not just an app, it's your ultimate pregnancy companion that provides you with invaluable information and guidance every step of the way. Enjoy the journey of motherhood with OB Wheel & Pregnancy - Your Comprehensive Guide to Pregnancy.

Benefits:

Ease and Convenience: The app simplifies pregnancy tracking by providing all essential tools and information in one place. It saves you from manual calculations and searching for relevant information.

Accuracy: The app is designed to provide precise results, whether it's calculating the due date, tracking trimesters, or determining measurements.

Informed Decision Making: By providing accurate, comprehensive information about each stage of pregnancy, the app helps expecting mothers and healthcare professionals make informed decisions about prenatal care and health management.

Accessibility: As a mobile application, OB Wheel & Pregnancy is accessible anytime, anywhere. This constant availability allows users to stay up-to-date and aware of their pregnancy progress at all times.

Peace of Mind: With OB Wheel & Pregnancy, you have a trusted companion that provides guidance and insights during this significant journey, promoting a sense of ease and peace of mind.

Educational: The app serves as a great learning tool for expecting parents, providing comprehensive information about pregnancy and the development of the baby.
Customization: The app can be tailored to each user's unique needs, offering personalized insights and recommendations.

Empowerment: By providing comprehensive information and real-time insights, the app empowers expecting mothers to take control of their pregnancy and prenatal care.

Disclaimer

While the OB Wheel & Pregnancy app strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information, it is intended for educational and informational purposes only. It should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read or accessed through this app.

Comprehensive obstetrical date calculator and patient tracker designed and developed by family physician Dr. Émilie Coudière, MD.


TRACK PREGNANCIES & POSTPARTUM

• Quick reference of upcoming, past-due, and postpartum patients.
• Full details of each patient, including fully customizable metrics and important dates such as expected length/weight, trimester start/end, etc.
• Easy entry of patient details using standard touch controls.


SYNC VIA iCLOUD

• Securely sync patients and settings across all your devices using the iCloud account you already trust.


COLLABORATE WITH COLLEAGUES

• Securely share patients with colleagues via iCloud.
• Changes made to shared patients will be immediately reflected on other devices.
* Requires iCloud.


TRY FOR FREE

• Free to try with 10-patient limit.
• Monthly or annual subscription is required to remove patient limit.
• Prices vary by region and are listed further down under Information > In-App Purchases.
• Subscription automatically renews 24 hours prior to expiration. Auto-renew can be turned off in the Settings app which allows subscription to expire at end of current period.

* Terms of use available at https://jeffreyfulton.ca/obtracker/terms

Welcome to AYA – Cry Analyzer, Baby Tracker & Sleep Support
 
Your ultimate companion in early motherhood, AYA helps you understand your baby’s needs with AI-powered tools, smart tracking, and calming support. Effortlessly monitor sleep, feeding, and development milestones — all-in-one daybook app created by parents, for parents.

From first smiles to growth leaps, AYA is your trusted baby center. Our features are science-based and designed to help you feel confident and calm, whether you’re a first-time parent or expanding your already created babylist registry.

CRY ANALYZER & BABY TRANSLATOR

Our innovative crybaby recognition technology deciphers your baby’s first language — crying — and translates it into likely needs such as hunger, discomfort, or fatigue. With up to 96.36% accuracy demonstrated in internal testing, you’ll respond faster and reduce stress.
85% of AYA parents say they calm their baby faster by combining analysis with calming tools like our shusher, lullabies, womb, and nature sounds.

AGE RANGE & USEFULNESS

AYA is ideal for newborns aged 0 to 6 months, but remains helpful through toddlerhood (up to age 2). Whether you’re nursing, pumping, bottle-feeding, or managing daily routines, AYA supports your evolving parenting journey.

MAIN FEATURES

Cry Analyzer & Listener:
Record your baby’s cry and get smart insights — is it hunger, gas, or the need for comfort? Our built-in listener decodes emotions and behaviors quickly and with research-backed accuracy.

Calming Sleep Center:
Soothe your infant with high-quality lullabies, white noise, babyphone sounds, womb ambiance, and nature audio.

Sleep & Activity Tracker:
Log sleep patterns, nap schedule, and new movement skills. Discover your baby’s natural rhythm to build predictable routines.

Feeding & Nursing Log:
Track breastfeeding, nursing, pumping, and bottle feeding sessions to ensure balanced nutrition. This information is also great for syncing with your pediatrician and spotting patterns.

Growth & Size Tracker:
Easily follow your baby’s size, weight, and developmental changes. Log everything from diaper outputs day after day to pediatrician notes in one place, and monitor early risk signs with confidence.

Milestone & Registry Support:
Celebrate firsts — first laughs, first steps — and log everything in your digital diary.

PRIVACY & DATA SECURITY

Your family’s privacy matters. All recordings are encrypted using AES-256. Raw audio is deleted after analysis, and only anonymized data is used to improve results. We don’t share your data — ever.

COMING SOON
- Deeper growth insights and prep tips for every age;
- 24/7 AI assistant for mothers and fathers eager to receive expert-backed guidance.

Start your journey today with AYA — your AI-powered baby care assistant, cry decoder, and emotional support system. Whether you’re managing a bump, building a list of observations, or tracking your baby’s progress, AYA helps you feel organized and supported every step of the way.

Download now and experience a calmer + smarter way to care for your babies — with AYA — plus obtain the peace of mind you deserve.

WARNING: * NOT INTENDED FOR MEDICAL USE, FOR FITNESS USE ONLY. This is not a medical product.

Promed Clinic app is a state-of-the-art clinic management system for your daily tasks. From patient details to appointments to invoices and receipts to various digital forms,  Promed Clinic app covers it all. Our system is capable of managing multiple clinics. With this app now doctors and all other staff can keep themselves up-to-date with status of their patients and manage their appointment schedule.

Information for Consumers and Patients
App contains info about all drugs approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
You can choose an analogue of the brand name for the active ingredient and dosage form, as well as according to the pharm classes.

Information for Health Care Professionals
Descriptions all drugs include medication guides with details on pharmacokinetics, dosing, side effects, interactions, assessment, and more.
You can explore hepatotoxicity each medicine by the LiverTox Database.

- access to all current features and info about pharm classes (by mechanism of action [MoA] or established pharmacologic class [EPC]) each medicine;
- cloud bookmarks and notes (use the app on multiple iPhones or iPads).

If you have any feature requests, suggestions or you simply need help, please email us  hda.feedback@gmail.com .

A true and totally 3D app for studying human anatomy, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface.

Features:
- You can rotate models to any angles and zoom in and out.
- Remove estructures to reveal the anatomical structures below them.
- 3D location quizzes to test your knowledge
- Switch on/off different anatomy systems
- Both male and female reproductive systems are available

Contents:
- Bones
- Ligaments
- Joints
- Muscles
- Circulation (arteries, vein and heart)
- Central nervous system
- Peripheral nervous system
- Sense organs
- Respiratory
- Digestive
- Urinary
- Reproductive ( both male and female)

Your Ultimate Guide to X-ray Anatomy – Learn, Explore, Master

Whether you’re a student, healthcare professional, or simply curious about anatomy, Xray Anatomy makes understanding radiographic images easier and more interactive than ever. Explore detailed X-ray images with precision and clarity, complete with intuitive labels and in-depth explanations.

KEY FEATURES:

Interactive Quizzes: Test your knowledge and track your progress with engaging quiz modes.
Detailed Image Descriptions: Each X-ray comes with thorough, accessible explanations of anatomical structures.
Color-Coded Anatomy: Easily identify different regions and structures with our color-coded guide.
High-Resolution DICOM Images: Zoom in and explore every detail with high-quality, scalable images.
Perfect for radiology students, anatomy learners, and medical professionals, Xray Anatomy brings the complexities of radiographic anatomy to your fingertips—anytime, anywhere.

Learn with ease. Master with confidence. Discover Xray Anatomy on your iPhone or iPad today!

This tool is the digital version of the MEC Wheel. It contains the medical eligibility criteria for starting use of contraceptive methods, based on Medical Eligibility Criteria for Contraceptive Use, 5th edition (2015), one of WHO’s evidence-based guidelines. It guides family planning providers in recommending safe and effective contraception methods for women with medical conditions or medically-relevant characteristics.
The tool includes recommendations on initiating use of nine common types of contraceptive methods:
 
1. Combined pills, COC (low dose combined oral contraceptives, with ≤ 35 μg ethinyl estradiol)
2. Combined contraceptive patch, P
3. Combined contraceptive vaginal ring, CVR
4. Combined injectable contraceptives, CIC
5. Progestogen-only pills, POP
6. Progestogen-only injectables, DMPA (IM,SC)/NET-EN (depot medroxyprogesterone acetate intramuscular or subcutaneous or norethisterone enantate intramuscular)
7. Progestogen-only implants, LNG/ETG (levonorgestrel or etonogestrel)
8. Levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine device, LNG-IUD
9. Copper-bearing intrauterine device, Cu-IUD

Alhosn is the official digital health platform for vaccinations in the UAE and more, developed in partnership with the Ministry of Health and Prevention and local health authorities. 

Leveraging advanced artificial intelligence (AI) technology, Alhosn delivers a user-friendly experience that provides up-to-date information and convenient access to a wide range of vaccines and more. 

The platform also offers personalized vaccination reminders, maintains a comprehensive vaccination record, and provides a secure method for sharing vaccination data with relevant authorities and more.

Lifeing – your trusted companion on the journey to motherhood! Track ovulation, symptoms, and your baby’s development from conception to birth with the #1 pregnancy app, according to Stories.

BABY DEVELOPMENT MONITORING
Lifeing – Pregnancy Tracker automatically calculates your estimated due date and builds a clear, week-by-week calendar of your baby’s growth. See your little one’s size and weight, plus beautiful illustrations of key fetal development milestones. Get helpful tips on taking care of yourself and your growing baby.

EASY-TO-USE TRACKERS
— Symptom Tracker: Log fatigue, nausea, Braxton Hicks contractions, and other sensations.
— Kick Counter: Monitor your baby’s movements.
— Contraction Timer: Track timing and distinguish between practice contractions and real ones.

PLAN AND STAY ON TOP OF EVERYTHING
No need to keep everything in your head—create reminders for doctor visits, ultrasounds, and lab tests. Use built-in checklists to prepare for delivery. They include essentials like packing your hospital bag, shopping for baby items, and getting your home ready.

PREGNANCY JOURNAL
Capture every special moment of your pregnancy—add photos, record baby’s first kicks, jot down your thoughts, and share personal notes with loved ones. All entries are stored in chronological order, so you can easily revisit your memories anytime. 

USEFUL TIPS & GUIDANCE
— Nutrition, fitness, and prenatal care advice.
— Guided Kegel exercises, breathing techniques, and healthy lifestyle tips.
— Expert articles on women’s health, pregnancy, and newborn care.

FERTILITY TRACKER
Trying to conceive? Use the built-in ovulation and menstrual cycle tracker to identify your most fertile days and understand hormonal changes.

Lifeing is here to help you feel confident through every stage of pregnancy. Enjoy the journey with Lifeing – Pregnancy Tracker!

PLEASE NOTE
Lifeing is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Use it to stay informed and organized, but always consult your doctor with any concerns.

The Anti Mosquito application works by generating Ultrasonic waves (out of audible range) that most mosquitos find repugnant. This will prevent you from getting bitten by mosquitos and other insects. The pitch of the sound is so high that most humans will not hear anything.

Only female mosquitoes bite humans and animals. They are attracted by light, body odor, lactic acid, carbon dioxide and heat.

Turn on the application and keep it close to you it will produce high frequency sound and mosquitos will avert you. It is not 100% guaranteed but will repel most of mosquitos biting you. Its not foolproof because there are about 3500 admitted mosquito species in the world and they all react marginally different to the repeller.

Use the frequency controls to find the excellent frequency for your place and enjoy outdoors without pesky bugs like mosquitos to annoy you!

The Ace Medical App is a user friendly App to support beneficiaries of Ace Medical Insurance. The App enables users to view their healthcare utilization, locate and get directions to Healthcare Service Providers, among others. The App also gives members access to an electronic card that can be used at the point of receiving care.

WHO PrEP Provider Training App is a mobile learning tool designed to support healthcare providers in understanding and implementing the World Health Organization’s (WHO) guidelines on oral and long-acting pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) for HIV prevention. This app is adapted from the official WHO provider module and is tailored for use in healthcare and community settings globally.
Key Features:
•	Comprehensive educational content based on the WHO 2024 PrEP Provider Module.
•	Step-by-step guidance on initiating, managing, and following up with clients on PrEP.
•	Covers oral PrEP, dapivirine vaginal ring (DVR), and long-acting injectable cabotegravir (CAB-LA).
•	Quick reference guides and tools for frontline providers.
•	Offline accessibility after initial download—ideal for low-resource settings.
•	Includes the calculators for ‘Scheduling Tool for CAB-LA’ , ‘Scheduling Tool for Lenacapavir Injections’ and ‘Kidney Function Assessment Calculator’.
Purpose:
The app serves as a training and decision-support tool for:
•	Physicians, nurses, pharmacists, and clinical officers.
•	Community health workers, peer educators, and lay providers.
•	Program implementers and PrEP coordinators.
It promotes evidence-based, rights-centered PrEP services that align with WHO’s global health sector strategies and differentiated service delivery models.
Privacy and Data Use:
•	No login or registration required.
•	No personal health data is collected or stored.
Based on WHO Guidelines:
All content is adapted from the “WHO Implementation Tool for Pre-exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) of HIV Infection: Provider Module (2024)” and complies with the WHO’s licensing terms (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 IGO).
This app does not offer clinical diagnosis or treatment services. It is intended purely for educational and training purposes in support of national and local HIV prevention programs.

"Try before you buy" - Download the FREE App, which includes sample content. In-App purchase required to unlock all content.

The Physicians' Cancer Chemotherapy Drug Manual, updated for 2024, is an essential resource for iPhone, iPad users. It features over 100 drugs, including 12 new FDA-approved agents, updated indications, and comprehensive information on dosages, toxicities, and chemotherapy regimens for major cancers. This manual is crucial for clinicians in cancer treatment.

Your must-have Physicians' Cancer Chemotherapy Drug Manual is available for your iPhone, iPad.

Completely revised and updated for 2024, the Physicians' Cancer Chemotherapy Drug Manual is an up-to-date guide to the latest information on standard therapy and recent advances in the field. Written by world-class experts in clinical cancer therapeutics, this essential reference provides a complete, easy-to-use catalogue of over 100 drugs and commonly used drug regimens-both on- and off-label-for the treatment of all the major cancers.

Key Features:
• Includes 12 new agents and several new supplemental indications that have all been approved by the FDA within the past year
• Updated new indications for previously approved agents
• Indications, drug doses and schedules, toxicities, and special considerations for each agent expanded and revised
• A specific chapter focused on antiemetic treatment regimens for both acute and delayed nausea/vomiting
• Diagrams of drug structures and pathways for many of the agents
• A comprehensive discussion of clinical pharmacology, special considerations, indications, and dosages
• Covers toxicity and drug-drug interactions
• A section on chemotherapy regimens for all major cancers
• Provides an overview of the basic principles of cancer drug therapy

Join the #1 Pregnancy & Baby Tracker App that’s Trusted by Millions for Week-by-Week Guidance and Baby Tracking Tools.

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.

During Pregnancy

* Due Date Calculator that determines your due date based on last period, IVF transfer, conception, and ultrasound, while sharing fun facts about your baby
* Week-by-week pregnancy tracker with info about baby development, symptoms and family preparation tips
* Themed baby size comparisons, visual countdown and 3D videos showing baby development in utero week by week of pregnancy
* Helpful daily tips designed to support you at every stage
* Keep track of your bump, symptoms, pregnancy weight, kick counts, birth plan and memories with our My Journal tool
* Expert-reviewed articles on signs of labor, pregnancy symptoms, baby and mom’s health and helpful tips
* Registry Builder to help you with your baby list and registry
* Detailed pregnancy and baby product reviews and expert buying guides
* Expecting Twins? Learn about different types of twins and possible fetal positions
* Use the contractions counter to track the frequency and duration of contractions

After Baby’s Arrival

* Baby Tracker that lets you time and track baby’s feedings, log pump sessions, diaper changes, tummy time, and more
* Month-by-month and milestone tracker for each step of your baby’s life, from the newborn to the toddler stage
* Daily tips tailored  to your baby’s age, stage, your postpartum recovery, and your parenting journey
* Record your postpartum symptoms and medications 
* Informative videos and articles about sleep schedules, feeding tips, milestones, and baby’s growth and week-by-week development
* Medically reviewed articles and info about baby’s health, doctor’s appointments and vaccines
* Join community groups meet people with due dates in the same month, newborn care, mom’s health conditions, parenting styles and more

Family Planning

* Ovulation Calculator that pinpoints your most fertile days based on last period and cycle
* Due Date Calculator that helps you figure out baby’s potential due date when you’re trying to conceive (TTC)
* Ovulation tracker and early pregnancy signs, plus keep a journal of your feelings when you’re trying to get pregnant
* Expert advice and articles to help you understand your cycle, signs of ovulation and pregnancy, fertility issues, adoption and surrogacy, and more
* Community groups devoted to preparing for pregnancy and fertility treatments

About Us 

All content on the What to Expect app is accurate, up-to-date, and reviewed by medical experts, including the What to Expect Medical Review Board. It aligns with current health guidelines and Heidi Murkoff’s trusted books 

Medical information comes from expert sources like ACOG, AAP, CDC, and peer-reviewed journals to ensure reliability and credibility.

For more about What to Expect's medical review and editorial policy, visit: https://www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/

Teach Me Anatomy provides students, doctors, and health professionals with the world’s most comprehensive anatomy learning platform. Includes integrated textbook, 3D anatomy models and a bank of over 1700 quiz questions – download to get started today!

ABOUT TEACH ME ANATOMY:
Teach Me Anatomy is a comprehensive, easy to read anatomy reference. Each topic combines anatomical knowledge with high-yield medical and clinical insights, seamlessly bridging the gap between scholarly learning and improved patient care.

Based on the award-winning website, Teach Me Anatomy is a great teaching and learning tool for students, educators, healthcare professionals and patients – or simply those with an interest in the human body!

FEATURES:

+ CONCISE AND EASY-TO-READ ANATOMY ENCYCLOPAEDIA: Contains over 400 comprehensive articles covering every aspect of anatomy.

+ 3D ANATOMY MODELS: Bring the human body to life with immersive 3D models to accompany each article.

+ HD ILLUSTRATIONS: More than 1200 full colour, high definition anatomy illustrations and clinical images.

+ INTEGRATED CLINICAL KNOWLEDGE: Clinical relevance textboxes link the fundamentals of anatomy to medical practice.

+ QUESTION BANK: Over 1700 multiple choice questions with explanations to consolidate your anatomy knowledge.

+ OFFLINE STORE: Learn anytime, anywhere - all articles, illustrations and quiz questions are stored offline for instant access.

+ REGIONAL ANATOMY: Includes Head & Neck, Neuroanatomy, Upper Limb, Back, Lower Limb, Abdomen, and Pelvis.

+ SYSTEMIC ANATOMY: Includes the skeletal system, muscular system, nervous system, circulatory system, lymphatic system, digestive system, respiratory system, urinary system and reproductive system.

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP:
Teach Me Anatomy offers premium membership via an in-app subscription. Premium membership grants cross-platform, advert-free access to bespoke 3D anatomy models and anatomy question bank.

You can subscribe monthly, quarterly, or annually and pay through your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your iTunes Account Settings any time after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

See our terms of service here: https://teachmeanatomy.info/terms-and-conditions/

Gives users QUICK access to information about prescription (RX) + over the counter (OTC) drugs. Drug information is updated monthly.
  
With over 100,000 RX + OTC drugs in the database, users can seamlessly use this application to find drug images, labels, documents (research, reviews, letters, and others), as well as clinical and consumer information all in one place…  
 
“So I just recently downloaded this and the first 10 minutes I've been exploring through it, I think it is awesome! I like how it is separated into different catergories and also lists information from CVS, and other stores. Overall this is an app I would gladly get the pro version.” - Katheryn    

FEATURES LIST: 
Search drug information by brand name, generic name, substance name, manufacturer name, dosage, chemical structure class, pharmacological class, plus more! 
Search drugs with the built in barcode scanner
Discover active/inactive ingredients 
Access clinical information such as the drugs adverse reactions, drugs interactions, overdosage information, how the drug is supplied, clinical pharmacology information, and much more… 
   
View important drug information ANYTIME, ANYWHERE 
   
This app is perfect for Pharmacists, Pharmacologists, Physicians, and Patients, who would like to know more about drugs they may be interacting with. Use the app to compare different drugs or find valuable information about the drug(s)! We cannot wait for you to discover the bountiful information stored within the Drug Bible! 
  
Thank You,
BuildLoop team.  
    
The Drug Bible is intended for use by consumers in the United States. Additionally, the app only supplies information for prescription/over-the-counter drugs within the U.S market, only. 

DISCLAIMER: Do not rely on The Drug Bible to make decisions regarding medical care. Always contact a physician before making any medical decisions. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

Introducing Glow Baby - the ultimate AI-powered baby tracker and parenting app that covers all aspects of your baby's development. Whether you're a new parent or a seasoned pro, Glow Baby is your go-to resource for tracking milestones, managing feedings, and providing personalized insights to support your parenting journey.


- Baby Tracker: Track your baby's growth, development, and daily activities with ease using Glow Baby's comprehensive Baby Tracker. Log feedings, diaper changes, sleep patterns, and more, ensuring you have a complete record of your baby's progress.


- Breastfeeding Tracker: Glow Baby offers a dedicated Breastfeeding Tracker to help you monitor nursing sessions, track feeding durations, and stay on top of your breastfeeding schedule. This feature is designed to support breastfeeding moms and provide valuable insights into your baby's feeding patterns.


- Sleep Tracker: Establish healthy sleep routines for your little one using Glow Baby's Sleep Tracker. Monitor your baby's sleep patterns, create personalized sleep schedules, and receive expert tips to promote better sleep for both baby and parent.


- Diaper Tracker: Keep track of your baby's diaper changes with Glow Baby's Diaper Tracker. Log wet and dirty diapers, track patterns, and ensure your baby stays comfortable and dry throughout the day. This feature helps you identify any irregularities and maintain optimal hygiene.


- Parenting Resources: Glow Baby is your comprehensive resource for parenting advice and support. Access articles, tips, and guidance on various topics such as baby development, nutrition, health, and more. Benefit from expert advice curated to meet your specific needs as a parent.


- AI-Powered Insights: Glow Baby utilizes advanced AI technology to provide personalized insights and recommendations tailored to your baby's needs. The app learns from your input, offering guidance and support based on your specific parenting journey.


- Pump Log: For breastfeeding moms who pump, Glow Baby includes a Pump Log feature to help you track pumping sessions, milk supply, and storage details. Stay organized and monitor your breastfeeding journey with ease.


- Nursing and Feeding Tracker: Whether you breastfeed, bottle-feed, or combine both, Glow Baby's Nursing and Feeding Tracker simplifies the process. Log feedings, track quantities, and monitor feeding patterns to ensure your baby is well-nourished.

Manage meds, identify pills, check interactions, compare prices and more. Discover detailed, peer-reviewed info on over 24,000 prescription drugs, OTC meds, and natural products all in one place.

Key Features
- My Med List. Create your health profile and track drug interactions, reminders and alerts, with offline access.
- Price Guide. Find the lowest prices for medications and search pharmacies near you.
- Pill Identifier. Identify pills by imprint, color and shape to confirm medications with confidence.
- Interactions Checker. Check potential interactions between prescription medications, OTC drugs, and supplements.
- Q & A. Find answers to thousands of medication-related questions, join support groups or ask a question.
- Compare Tool - Compare any medication side-by-side.
- Side Effects Checker - Access detailed side effect information for thousands of prescription and OTC medications, from common mild reactions to rare severe effects.
- Dosage Information - Reliable dose guidance.
- FDA Alerts - Stay up to date with product recalls, safety alerts, and FDA-related news.
- Health Professionals - Tailored tools and information for medical professionals, including FDA monographs.

Permissions
We request limited permissions to improve your experience:
- Network access: Required to connect to our database.
- Media/Storage: For installation on your local device only, we never access your personal files.
- Your location: Used when you choose to find nearby pharmacies when using the drug discount card.

About Drugs.com
With over 25 million U.S. monthly visitors, Drugs.com is a Webby-nominated health information platform offering peer-reviewed data on more than 24,000 medications. Whether you're a patient, caregiver, or healthcare professional, the app provides reliable tools to manage and understand medication use.

Note: Drugs.com does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Do not rely on this app to replace medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always consult with your healthcare professional.

Support & Subscriptions
Please visit: https://www.drugs.com/apps/support/ for support and feedback, if its subscription related, our team will prioritize your request.
